-- Schema Im_Bored

DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS `Im_Bored` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema Im_Bored
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `Im_Bored` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`MEMBERS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MEMBERS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MEMBERS` (
  `id_member` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `login` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `password` VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_member`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` (
  `id_movie` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` VARCHAR(80) NULL,
  `aired` DATE NULL,
  `image` VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  `synopsis` VARCHAR(1000) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_movie`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS` (
  `id_music` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `aired` DATE NULL,
  `image` VARCHAR(100) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_music`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`ACTORS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`ACTORS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`ACTORS` (
  `id_actor` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `last_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `first_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_actor`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MOVIES`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MOVIES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MOVIES` (
  `id_played` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_actor` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_movie` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_played`),
  INDEX `fk_Filmes_has_Acteurs_Acteurs1_idx` (`id_actor` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_Filmes_has_Acteurs_Filmes1_idx` (`id_movie` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Filmes_has_Acteurs_Filmes1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_movie`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` (`id_movie`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Filmes_has_Acteurs_Acteurs1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_actor`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`ACTORS` (`id_actor`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTORS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTORS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTORS` (
  `id_director` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `last_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  `first_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_director`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTED`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTED` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTED` (
  `id_directed` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_director` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_movie` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_directed`),
  INDEX `fk_Filmes_has_Réalisteur_Réalisteur1_idx` (`id_director` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_Filmes_has_Réalisteur_Filmes1_idx` (`id_movie` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Filmes_has_Réalisteur_Filmes1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_movie`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` (`id_movie`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Filmes_has_Réalisteur_Réalisteur1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_director`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`DIRECTORS` (`id_director`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`GROUPS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`GROUPS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`GROUPS` (
  `id_group` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_group`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MUSICS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MUSICS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`PLAYED_MUSICS` (
  `id_played` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_group` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_music` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_played`),
  INDEX `fk_Musiques_has_Groupe_Groupe1_idx` (`id_group` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_Musiques_has_Groupe_Musiques1_idx` (`id_music` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Musiques_has_Groupe_Musiques1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_music`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS` (`id_music`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_Musiques_has_Groupe_Groupe1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_group`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`GROUPS` (`id_group`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MUSICS`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MUSICS` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MUSICS` (
  `id_listed_music` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_member` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_music` INT NOT NULL,
  `favorit` TINYINT NULL,
  `grade` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_listed_music`),
  INDEX `fk_LISTE_M_has_MUSIQUES_MUSIQUES1_idx` (`id_music` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_LISTED_MUSICS_MEMBERS1_idx` (`id_member` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_LISTE_M_has_MUSIQUES_MUSIQUES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_music`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS` (`id_music`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_LISTED_MUSICS_MEMBERS1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_member`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MEMBERS` (`id_member`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MOVIES`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MOVIES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`LISTED_MOVIES` (
  `id_listed_movie` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_member` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_movie` INT NOT NULL,
  `favorit` TINYINT NULL,
  `grade` INT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_listed_movie`),
  INDEX `fk_LISTE_F_has_FILMES_FILMES1_idx` (`id_movie` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_LISTED_MOVIES_MEMBERS1_idx` (`id_member` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_LISTE_F_has_FILMES_FILMES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_movie`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` (`id_movie`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_LISTED_MOVIES_MEMBERS1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_member`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MEMBERS` (`id_member`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`TYPES`

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`TYPES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`TYPES` (

  `name` VARCHAR(50) NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_type`))
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`MUSIC_TYPES`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MUSIC_TYPES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MUSIC_TYPES` (
  `id_music_type` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_music` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_type` INT NOT NULL,
  INDEX `fk_GENRES_has_MUSIQUES_MUSIQUES1_idx` (`id_music` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_GENRES_has_MUSIQUES_GENRES1_idx` (`id_type` ASC),
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_music_type`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_GENRES_has_MUSIQUES_GENRES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_type`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`TYPES` (`id_type`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_GENRES_has_MUSIQUES_MUSIQUES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_music`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MUSICS` (`id_music`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `Im_Bored`.`MOVIE_TYPES`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MOVIE_TYPES` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Im_Bored`.`MOVIE_TYPES` (
  `id_movie_type` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id_movie` INT NOT NULL,
  `id_type` INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_movie_type`),
  INDEX `fk_FILMES_has_GENRES_GENRES1_idx` (`id_type` ASC),
  INDEX `fk_FILMES_has_GENRES_FILMES1_idx` (`id_movie` ASC),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_FILMES_has_GENRES_FILMES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_movie`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`MOVIES` (`id_movie`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_FILMES_has_GENRES_GENRES1`
    FOREIGN KEY (`id_type`)
    REFERENCES `Im_Bored`.`TYPES` (`id_type`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB;
